activities: enginologi works in collaboration with its clients to improve the impact of sales, marketing, and service operations. As such, enginologi provides analytical SaaS software solutions, offers consulting services, and delivers data processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, both automatically and manually processed
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: Dispute resolution programs provided by the European Data Protection Authorities & Swiss FDPIC
